name: Moltres ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Legendary Ascent
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Moltres ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with Moltres ex. If you do, you may also move any number of basic {R} Energy cards attached to your Pokémon to Moltres ex.

attacks.name: Crushing Flames
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Moltres ex. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
